Fixes and Improvements

  • Uses dynamic text and selection background colors in the icon view based on the collectionâ€™s background color
  • Fixes an issue where the Updates tab was initially selected in the Settings window rather than the Appearance tab
  • Fixes an issue where the status bar in the sidebar was not displayed correctly

New Features

  • Icon view modes can now be chosen from the View menu
  • Adds thumbnail size view options for the list view mode
  • The icon preview in the gallery view is now draggable

Fixes and Improvements

  • The icon selection can be cleared by clicking the background in the gallery view
  • Moves the sidebar icon size settings to the Appearance tab in the Settings window
  • Moves the low-resolution emulation settings to the Appearance tab in the Settings window
  • Adds point size labels to all icon/thumbnail size settings
  • Removes the Minimize and Zoom buttons from the View Options panel

New Features

  • Adds an icon gallery view and corresponding view options

Fixes and Improvements

  • Includes minor interface improvements
